reviewText: The DVDs in the Ultimate Combinations series are my favorites from IAMED because they offer the opportunity to learn from several different instructors and since there is so much variety, you can always find something you'll like! Ultimate Combinations 4 - Learn Belly Dance DVD and number 5 was especially interesting to me since I haven't had the opportunity to take from either Aradia or Jamileh and both of them are on these 2 DVDs. I was impressed with them and now look forward to taking a workshop from either one! I have taken Katia's workshops before. They are not only fun but she never ceases to amaze me, she always comes up with some of the most unusual things and Ava is not only crisp and precise but challenging! Zahra Zuhair is like melted butter, she looks effortless on stage and her teaching manner is so relaxed. If you can only buy one or two DVDs, I would highly recommend both Ultimate Combinations 4 - Learn Belly Dance DVD and this one, number 5 of the Ultimate Combinations series! Each one ends with a beautiful performance by one of the instructors!
